title: Avoiding Getting Ripped Off On The Internet

contents.title: Introduction
contents.HTMLContent:
The internet is a very powerful tool. It allows us to do everything from use Facebook, to do banking, and to learn online.

However, with all its benefits there are also some things you should worry about. Many people and companies attempt to take advantage of internet users.

This lesson teaches you some basic techniques to protect yourself on the Internet.

contents.title: Advertisements
contents.HTMLContent:
Many websites on the Internet are free. These companies make their money by having you click on advertisements.

Sometimes, ads are useful. However a lot of the time, they are disguised to make you click on them.

In this section we will teach you how to identify ads so you can choose when to click on them.

contents.title: Ads in Search
contents.HTMLContent:
Google is a common search engine and it relies on ads to make money. When you type in a search, some of the results are ads. Sometimes these ads are relevant, sometimes they aren't.

Above we have a screenshot of a Google search for "Cars". Find 2 ads.

contents.title: The Search Bar
contents.HTMLContent: Start typing in the search bar, as soon as you start typing, google will start showing results

contents.title: The Search Button
contents.HTMLContent: Click the Google Search Button to actually search for something
